Play.Header: NYG wins toss, elects to Receive, and DAL elects to defend the North goal.
6-N.Folk kicks 68 yards from DAL 30 to NYG 2. 87-D.Hixon to NYG 23 for 21 yards (57-K.Burnett). Return right side of the field.
New York Giants at 15:00, (1st play from scrimmage 14:54)

Play.PlayDescription: (14:54) 27-B.Jacobs up the middle to NYG 28 for 5 yards (51-A.Ayodele).
(14:15) 27-B.Jacobs left end to NYG 38 for 10 yards (98-G.Ellis).
(13:30) 10-E.Manning pass incomplete deep middle. Pass lobbed incomplete at the Dallas 30; Hamlin closest defender.
(13:25) 27-B.Jacobs right tackle to NYG 43 for 5 yards (98-G.Ellis).
(12:39) (Shotgun) 10-E.Manning pass incomplete short right to 81-A.Toomer (35-J.Reeves).
PENALTY on DAL-94-D.Ware, Defensive Offside, 4 yards, enforced at NYG 43 - No Play.
(12:33) 10-E.Manning up the middle to NYG 48 for 1 yard (96-M.Spears; 90-J.Ratliff).
(12:02) 10-E.Manning pass short left to 81-A.Toomer for 52 yards, TOUCHDOWN. Toomer caught the pass on a curl route at the Dallas 39 before spinning away and running down left sideline for the score.
9-L.Tynes extra point is GOOD, Center-93-J.Alford, Holder-18-J.Feagles.
